name: Off-road 4x4 SUV Driving 2018
description:
Experience the Amazing Off-roads, Become the Jeep Legend, you have to find your way among the hurdles and conquer all terrain,
Features of this game;
- Amazing 3D environment, including desert, Meadows and Mountains all in one.
- Realistic Physics Engine, With great suspension and AWD drivetrain.
- Speed Boosts available in different locations.
- Secrete treasure to find in the wide expanse of land.
- Drive full speed ahead and conquer the Off-road.
- Accelerometer, buttons and steering controls Support,
- 15 Different and interesting levels to choose from.
- 4 amazing jeeps to take your pick from.
- Customize everything, from paint to Bumpers, this game has it all.
- Multiple cameras angles to experience full driving control
Your Feedbacks and ratings are valuable to us.
In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it and reply to your email as soon as possible.
